Title: AZ-900 : Azure Fundamentals
Description:
Launch Your Cloud Journey with the AZ-900 Azure Fundamentals Certification
In today's technology-focused world, the cloud is not just the future, it's NOW. Are you prepared to participate? Your first and most crucial step into Microsoft Azure is the AZ-900 Azure Fundamentals certification with SkillTech.

Title: AI-900 : Azure AI Fundamentals
Description: Artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning are disrupting every industry on the planet. The AI-900 Azure AI Fundamentals certification is your important first step into this exciting and future-proof world. This foundational course is built for anyone with or without a technical background, who wants to learn about AI, what it means in practice, and how the possibilities exist using Microsoft Azure.

Title: DP-900 : Azure Data Fundamentals
Description: In this data-driven world, learning to utilize cloud services to manage and manipulate data is no longer an option. The DP-900 Azure Data Fundamentals certification is your introduction into the immense world of cloud data services. This course is the ideal first course for anyone wishing to pursue a career path in data engineering, data science, or database administration as it relates to Microsoft Azure services.

Title: AI-3018 : Foundations of Microsoft Copilot
Description: Microsoft Copilot is more than an assistant, it's a new way of working. The AI-3018: Foundations of Microsoft Copilot course will be your roadmap to becoming an early leader in this transformational space. Learn the fundamental architecture of Microsoft Copilot including Large Language Models (LLMs), Microsoft Graph, and Microsoft 365 Apps. Discover how to create and implement plugins to expand Copilot's functionality, use Microsoft Graph connectors, and integrate with Power Platform. Develop strategic plans for Copilot adoption and learn to manage licenses, permissions, and security policies.

Title: AZ-305 : Designing Microsoft Azure Infrastructure
Description: Moving from implementing solutions to creating strategic designs is the true indicator of a cloud expert. The AZ-305: Designing Microsoft Azure Infrastructure Solutions exam is a widely respected certification for professionals who design performant, resilient, and scalable Azure solutions. It’s the final step toward earning the Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert badge.

Title: AZ-204 : Developing Solutions for Microsoft Azure
Description: For a developer, the cloud is the ultimate playground. The AZ-204: Developing Solutions for Microsoft Azure is the definitive credential for programmers and software engineers who are building, deploying and maintaining applications using Azure. Earning the AZ-204 certification is evidence that you possess the technical knowledge to take an idea from concept to scalable, secure, resilient cloud solution.

Title: AZ-104 : Microsoft Azure Administrators
Description: The Azure Administrator is the most critical role in cloud computing. In the industry, the AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrators certification is the recognized standard for professionals involved in the implementation, management, and monitoring of an organization's Microsoft Azure environment. This is your opportunity to demonstrate that you have the real-world skills needed to keep a company's cloud infrastructure running effectively and securely.

Title: AI-102 : Azure AI Engineer Associate
Description: Embark on the AI-102 journey to master how to design, develop, and deploy AI solutions using Microsoft Azure’s powerful stack. This course provides a structured, hands-on learning path—combining theoretical insights with practical labs—to equip you with the skills needed to implement real-world AI systems.

Title: AZ-400 : Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions
Description: The ability to deliver value quickly and reliably is a key differentiator in today’s fast-paced digital world. DevOps is the cultural and technical capability that enables this. The AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions certification establishes that you can combine people, processes and technologies to deliver value continuously. This is the credential for aspiring Microsoft Certified: DevOps Engineer Experts.

Title: Mastering AI Agents
Description: This course is your complete guide to building intelligent, autonomous AI agents using Azure AI Foundry, GenAI models, and modern agentic frameworks. Whether you're a developer, cloud engineer, or AI enthusiast, you'll gain hands-on experience in designing agents that think, plan, and act.

Title: AI-3016 : Develop Generative AI Apps
Description:
In this comprehensive course, participants will navigate and utilize Azure AI Studio’s core features effectively.
Practical skills are honed through hands-on labs, reinforcing your theoretical knowledge. Practical Application: Attendees will work on real-world projects, ensuring they can apply what they learn to develop and manage AI projects within Azure AI Studio.

Title: AI-3026 : Develop AI Agents in Azure
Description: Generative Artificial Intelligence (AI) is becoming more functional and accessible, and AI agents are a key component of this evolution. This learning path will help you understand the AI agents, including when to use them and how to build them, using Azure AI Foundry Agent Service and Semantic Kernel Agent Framework. By the end of this learning path, you will have the skills needed to develop AI agents on Azure.

Title: AI-3004 : Build an Azure AI Vision Solution
Description: AI-3004 is an intermediate-level course that teaches you how to design, build, and deploy computer vision solutions using Microsoft Azure AI Vision services. You'll work hands-on with image and video data, using both prebuilt and custom models. The course covers image analysis, object detection, face recognition, OCR (text reading), and video analysis. You’ll use Azure Cognitive Services, custom vision tools, and related APIs—and write code (in C# or Python) to integrate these solutions into real applications

Title: AI-3003 : Natural Language Solutions in Azure
Description: AI-3003 is an intermediate-level, hands-on course that teaches you how to build intelligent Natural Language Processing (NLP) solutions using Azure AI Services. The course is designed for developers and AI engineers who want to go beyond fundamentals and start implementing real-world language-based applications. You’ll work with Azure AI Language, Translator, and Speech Services to analyze text, build interactive conversational models, recognize entities, translate languages, enable speech recognition & synthesis, and integrate these capabilities into your applications.

Title: AI-3002 : Develop AI Information Extraction Solutions in Azure
Description: AI-3002: Develop AI Information Extraction Solutions in Azure is an intermediate-level training course for software developers and AI engineers. It focuses on building solutions that extract structured and unstructured data from documents using Azure’s AI Document Intelligence services. Learners will work with both prebuilt and custom models to analyze business forms, receipts, IDs, tax documents, and more. The course also covers integrating these models into pipelines like Azure Cognitive Search for knowledge mining and creating richer search experiences.

Title: Microservices with Containers and AKS
Description: Build, deploy, and scale microservices applications using Docker containers and Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS). Learn container fundamentals, Docker images, Kubernetes architecture, pods, services, deployments, and ingress controllers. Master CI/CD pipelines for containerized applications, service mesh implementation, monitoring and logging, security best practices, and scaling strategies. Understand how to design microservices architecture, implement API gateways, manage configurations, and deploy production-grade containerized applications on AKS.
